title: Black Dragonborn

Black Dragonborn Racial Features RACEFEATURES Subrace Traits TRAITS

Black Dragonborn

Black Dragonborn is a Subrace of Dragonborn in Baldur's Gate 3. Black Dragonborn PRIMARYTRAIT. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types of Races. Each of them has their special characteristics and some of them have Sub-Races which provide different Features and Traits.

Despite no ancestral links to the mighty creature, these dragonborn share the charcoal coloration and fizzling, acrid breath of black dragons.
